definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: Vaccination campaigns are still on-going in a further 6 districts.
sentences.chinese: 预防接种运动在另外6个县仍在进行。

sentences.english: Beyond plan of children vaccinate vaccine even what want have an inoculation?
sentences.chinese: 儿童预防接种疫苗程序表以外的还要哪些要接种的吗？

sentences.english: The DRC has not yet benefitted from preventive vaccination campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 刚果民主共和国尚未从预防接种运动中获益。

sentences.english: Children vaccinate from vaccination prevented service were 99.68%.
sentences.chinese: 的儿童都是到预防接种门诊进行接种。

sentences.english: No entity or individual shall discretionarily carry out mass vaccination.
sentences.chinese: 任何单位或者个人不得擅自进行群体性预防接种。

sentences.english: Coordinating epidemic prevention station and doing well the prevention vaccination and prevention and controlling of infectious disease.
sentences.chinese: 配合卫生防疫站，做好预防接种和传染病防治。

sentences.english: Role playing is just one part of anti-smoking inoculation.
sentences.chinese: 角色扮演只是反吸烟预防接种的一部分。

sentences.english: You can protect yourself against hepatitis B by being vaccinated.
sentences.chinese: 你可通过预防接种保护自己免患乙型肝炎。

definition: polio/abbr. for 脊髓灰質炎|脊髓灰质炎[ji3 sui3 hui1 zhi4 yan2]
epidemic encephalitis B (abbr. for 乙型腦炎|乙型脑炎[yi3 xing2 nao3 yan2])
see 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]
